channel.title: Please help me with hail command!
channel.description:
Okay now read carefully before asking any questions.
I have a hail command and it works perfectly but how can i make it when my friend uses it it would say different text for him. bcuz i added a command and it said the same text as mine? Please can some 1 help me out with this
